entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Campbellton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:21 AM NST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Rain, -1.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gander Int'l Airport 09:52 AM NST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Light Freezing Rain
Temperature: -1.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -2.2°C
Wind: ESE 50 km/h gust 65 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this morning then changing to ice pellets or freezing rain and then changing to rain near noon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 then to 60 gusting to 90 near noon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Temperature rising to 6 this evening then falling. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain ending this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Amount 2 mm. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 90 becoming south 30 gusting to 50 this evening then becoming west 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Temperature rising to 6 this evening then falling. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon with 60 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 4. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 24 December 2022
